Summary: I saw it outside my balcony and was moving slowly
divs: Sighting DetailsMy boyfriend was lying on the couch..the curtains were open and he called me to look at something..we went on the balcony and saw a craft moving slowly with bright lights..it seemed to be a triangle shape..it seemed it was just over the treetops and big and bright with lights all around..I grabbed my camera to go out back but then it was gone. I was in shock..i have never seen anything like this befor.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There were no other sightings in Niagara Falls on or around March 20th 2012
